_sText:
KmZ Snow Complex
Basically its a remake of KmZ Oasis Jail which i also made, i decided to remake it because people said that the map was too small, not being ammount of rooms but generally, so i decided to remake the map to a better size, and changed the scenary, i deleted the football pitch, but moved the cage and added a luxury cell, i changed the means of rebelling to make it better aswell. Hope you enjoy.

Changes and Fixes in v2:
In the Secret room, you dont have to jump to pick up the weapons
The button to the secret room is now the same texture as everything else in the area
Skybox has changed to cobble
Lighting has been fixed slightly
Signs arround the map stating the room names
Sauna now has doors(auto)
Ring teleporter texture change
Prefabs:
StarGate Ring Teleporter - calum - http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/702
